channel.title: #149: A Saber Feedback update six months after acquisition
channel.description:
@freyfogle is back again. This week he interviews me on my progress with [Saber Feedback](https://saberfeedback.com/), six months after acquisition.
<iframe height="200px" width="100%" frameborder="no" scrolling="no" seamless src="https://player.simplecast.com/667f0a05-eadf-49f1-b366-51d3a98bc591?dark=false"></iframe>
Ed marvels at how many words we were able to write about [feedback buttons](https://saberfeedback.com/feedback-button/).
We also talk a bit about co-working in the age of Covid.
You can also listen to this episode here: https://bootstrapped.fm/149-a-saber-feedback-update-six-months-after-acquisition/
